Package com.example.as1.api

Interface RecipeApi

public interface RecipeApi
The RecipeApi interface defines a set of HTTP methods for interacting with a recipe-related API. It provides methods for retrieving, posting, and searching recipes using Retrofit and HTTP requests.
Since:
1.0

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    retrofit2.Call<List<Recipe>>
    GetAllRecipes()
    Retrieves a list of all recipes from the API.

    Retrieves a recipe by its name from the API.

    Posts a new recipe to the API by sending a JSON body with the recipe information.

  • Method Details

    • GetAllRecipes

      @GET("recipe/all") retrofit2.Call<List<Recipe>> GetAllRecipes()
      Retrieves a list of all recipes from the API.
      Returns:
      A Call that can be executed to get a list of all recipes.

    • PostRecipeByPath

      @POST("recipe/post/{name}/{instructions}") retrofit2.Call<Recipe> PostRecipeByPath(@Path("name") String name, @Path("instructions") String instructions)
      Posts a new recipe to the API by specifying the name and instructions in the URL path.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the recipe to post.
      instructions - The instructions for the recipe to post.
      Returns:
      A Call that can be executed to post a new recipe.

    • PostRecipeByBody

      @POST("recipe/post") retrofit2.Call<Recipe> PostRecipeByBody(@Body Recipe newRecipe)
      Posts a new recipe to the API by sending a JSON body with the recipe information.
      Parameters:
      newRecipe - The new recipe to post as a JSON body.
      Returns:
      A Call that can be executed to post a new recipe.

    • getRecipeByName

      @GET("recipe/get/{name}") retrofit2.Call<Recipe> getRecipeByName(@Path("name") String name)
      Retrieves a recipe by its name from the API.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the recipe to retrieve.
      Returns:
      A Call that can be executed to get a recipe by name.

    • searchRecipesByName

      @GET("/recipe/searchByName") retrofit2.Call<List<Recipe>> searchRecipesByName(@Query("name") String name)
      Searches for recipes by name using a query parameter in the request.
      Parameters:
      name - The name to search for in recipes.
      Returns:
      A Call that can be executed to search for recipes by name.

    • searchRecipesByIngredient

      @GET("/recipe/searchByIngredient") retrofit2.Call<List<Recipe>> searchRecipesByIngredient(@Query("ingredientName") String ingredientName)
      Searches for recipes by ingredient name using a query parameter in the request.
      Parameters:
      ingredientName - The ingredient name to search for in recipes.
      Returns:
      A Call that can be executed to search for recipes by ingredient name.
